plot outline: The movie spins around a family being trapped by a stranger on road. Most of the times our judgement on people around us goes wrong when it comes to identifying a real enemy. How do you resolve it or come out of it is shown in this family drama, filled with thrill and suspense. The plot tells the story of how the ulterior motives of people can turn your life upside down. Based and inspired from a real-life incident, Vijay Babu and Parvathy Nair play pivotal roles supported by many known faces.
title: Overtake
plot: Based and inspired by a real-life incident, the movie depicts the events that take place after a family is trapped by a stranger.

The movie spins around a family being trapped by a stranger on road. Most of the times our judgement on people around us goes wrong when it comes to identifying a real enemy.
